summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the golf programs of the Department of Parks and Recreation; authorizing the Superintendent to contract with Municipal Golf of Seattle for planning services; increasing the 1995 Budget of the Department of Parks and Recreation; increasing the 1994 Budget of the Department of Parks and Recreation to manage a Request for Proposal process for the development and operation of the Interbay Golf Course; and declaring an emergency, all upon a three-fourths vote of the City Council.
